name: Arcade Cookbook
description:
Play some classic arcade games to finish the recipe !

Game Jam

  • Name : "VIDEO GAMES LAB : Game Jam 2021"
  • Date : November 2021
  • Duration : 60 hours
  • Theme : "Arcade"

Description

You play some ingredients stuck inside some arcade games.
Beat these games and jump into the pot to finish the recipe !

(I obviously don't take responsibilties if you try to mix cherries, fries and a taco inside a pot and get sick)

Controls

  • Move : ZQSD / WASD
  • Camera : Move the mouse
  • Jump / Shoot : Space
  • Menu / Quit : Escape

Credits

  • Engine : Unity
  • Character controller : Character Movement Fundamentals (by Jan Ott)
  • 3D models : Food Kit (by Kenney)
  • Fonts : Kenney Fonts (by Kenney)
  • Sound effect : Eat Chips
  • Music :
    • Getting it Done Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
